title: The touchscreen is slow or unresponsive when using magnification gestures
answer:
Android 4.2 and above support magnification gestures. After turning on magnification gestures, you can zoom in or out by tapping on the screen three times. However, the current design of this function may differ from what users are accustomed to, giving them the impression that the touchscreen is unresponsive.

If you want to disable magnification gestures, go to Settings, select Accessibility > Magnification gestures and turn off Magnification gestures.
